title: ➤Cozy 2 Bed Split in Allston! H+HW Included! Available 9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 44355810', 'Rent: $2,100 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water, Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Charming 2 bedroom/1 bathroom in Allston is now available for tours and a 9/1 move-in!', 'Can also be used as a normal 1 bedroom set-up.', 'Steps away from tons of restaurants, shops, and nightlife!', 'Public transit is also just outside the front door!', "Get to Packard's Corner or BU easily!", 'This unit features:', '- Hardwood floors', '- Updated kitchen', '- Spacious rooms', '- Laundry in building!', 'Cat friendly (extra $25/month).', 'Off-street parking may be available for rent.', 'Reach out now for more info on this unit and other options!', 'Please email Terry or respond to this ad to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!', 'Email: Terry @ benjaminapartments .', 'com (Remove the spaces)', 'Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent', 'Nearby transportation:', 'Bus: 64', 'Cambridge St opp Hano St (0.29 mi)', 'Bus: 57 Brighton Ave @ Linden St (0.16 mi)', 'Tram: B Harvard Avenue (0.07 mi)', 'Rail: Framingham/Worcester Line Boston Landing (0.59 mi)', 'Bus: 66 Harvard Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.06 mi)', 'FEATURES', 'Dishwasher', 'Fireplace (Decorative)', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Renovated kitchen', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
